nodes.text: The Architects were an ancient group that saved the planet Livno III through the construction of Breeze, Rain, and Solstice Globes. Together, the globes powered a machine which regulated the planet's environment.

The Architects were first mentioned in the 2018 junior novel Lando's Luck, which was written by Justina Ireland. In Star Wars Legends, the ancient Celestials were occasionally referred to as Architects.
The Celestials were mentioned in the canon comic book Lando - Double or Nothing 2, although a connection between the Celestials and Architects has not been established.
